lvl3.question: Fill in the blank to declare the scanner: Scanner scan = ___ Scanner(System.in)
What is the name of the scanner? Scanner read = new Scanner(System.in)
Fill in the blank while having the scanner named scan: String name = ____.nextLine();
Fill in the blank for taking in an int as an input: scan._______();
Fill in the blank for taking in a float as an input: scan._________();
Fill in the blank for the import of the scanner class: import java.util._______;
Fill in the blank in order to create a variable string to be taken as an input: ______ sentence = scan.nextLine();
Fill in the blank for taking in a string for a scanner named scan: _____________();
Fill in the blank for taking in a float for a scanner named scan: ______________();
Fill in the blank to import the scanner class: ______ java.util.Scanner
